clinical_study.brief_title: Regional Differences In Indication for Ventral Hernia Repair
clinical_study.official_title: Regional Differences In Indication for Ventral Hernia Repair

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of the present study is to investigate whether there are differences in indication for ventral hernia repair and surgical approach among hernia surgeons from different geographical regions of Denmark.

detailed_description.textblock: 30 outpatient consultation will be taped and distributed among hernia surgeons in different regions of Denmark. The surgeon will then be asked to answer a questionnaire regarding the treatment and surgical technique.

primary_outcome.measure: Differences in indication for ventral hernia repair
primary_outcome.description: Number of patients offered a ventral hernia repair after primary consultation by different hernia specialists.

secondary_outcome.measure: Differences in choice of surgical technique between surgeons
secondary_outcome.description: Which surgical approach does different surgeons offer patients with a ventral hernia

study_pop.textblock: Patients referred to Køge Hospital Surg. Department with ventral hernia in December 2014

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients referred to Køge Hospital Surg. Department with ventral hernia in December 2014
